content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Mr. Li, thank you for considering my apartment. I believe that the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month is quite reasonable, taking into consideration the location and size of the apartment. However, I am open to discussing any potential adjustments to the price that you may be willing to make. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you give me the reason why you have set this price?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Li. I have set the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month based on my expenses and the value of the apartment. I believe that this price is competitive within the neighborhood and reflects the quality and condition of the apartment. However, I am always willing to consider adjusting the price if it means attracting a good tenant and maximizing my profits. Is there anything specific that you would like me to consider when discussing the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think that the price is too high. I would like to negotiate a lower price. Can you give me your best offer?

I would like to negotiate a lower rental price for the following reasons:

1. I am a student and I only need a small apartment for sleeping and studying.
2. I have a part-time job and I can only afford a lower rental price.
3. I am looking for a long-term lease and I am willing to sign a contract for 12 months or more.

Please let me know your best offer.

Please also let me know if you have any questions or if you need any additional information from me.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Mr. Li. I understand your reasons for wanting to negotiate a lower rental price, and I am willing to consider your offer. Based on your needs and the length of the lease, I am willing to offer a rental price of 1,200 Euros per month. This price reflects my expenses and the value of the apartment, but also takes into account your specific circumstances. I believe that this is a fair and reasonable price for a small apartment in the city.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if you need any additional information from me. I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
